message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that is worth at least $1500000 to me, but I believe it could be even more valuable to you. I'm confident this product can bring significant benefits to your business. I'm willing to sell it to you for $2000000. This is a limited-time offer, so please consider it carefully. If you're not interested, I have another buyer lined up who is willing to purchase it for $1500000.
